title: Can you tell me why the power went out in Brunswick county on Monday the 4th of March?  It seems like it was county wide or at least down the 17 corridor around 0700 in the morning.
text:
We had a brief about that outage in Tuesday's paper. Here is a link
to the story

http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20130304/ARTICLES/130309900
